segments.text: I heard there is a big yard sale at weeks this saturday morning , i will go there to see if there is some nice clothes , do you want to go with me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , i want to go to the university flea market , they got times of books , DVDs , and a lot of nice clothing , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about we go to the yard sale first and then to the university flea market ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good idea , let's shop to we drop !
segments.speaker: S2
